Instruction: Slice the acorn squash into rings, then remove the seeds.
In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
Add the acorn squash rings to the skillet and sprinkle with brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
Cook for 5-7 minutes per side, or until the squash is tender and caramelized.
Remove from the skillet and serve hot as a sweet and savory side dish.
